Package utils

package utils
  • Class
    Description
    BallRemover
    Listener calss to remove a ball from the game.
    BlockRemover
    Listener-class to remove a block when a ball and a block of different colors collide.
    CollisionInfo
    Class to store information about the collision.
    Counter
    Class for the counter.
    Game
    Class representing the game.
    GameEnvironment
    Class to store all the collidables of the game.
    GeometryTester
    This class does some simple tessting of the Point and Line classes.
    HitListener
    Interface for a listener that listens for all collisions between blocks and balls.
    HitNotifier
    Interface for a notifier - a guy who will tell the listeners that an action occured.
    ScoreTrackingListener
    A listener for keeping track of the score.
    SpriteCollection
    Class to hold all the sprites.
